channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spike Lee’s Affordability Thriller

item.title: There’s No Evidence Australia’s Strict Gun Control Laws Are Effective
item.description: The supposed benefits of Australia's gun buy-back rest on flawed statistics. Only concealed carry reduces mass public shootings.

item.title: Rep. Dan Newhouse, a Republican who voted to impeach Trump, to retire from Congress
item.description: Rep. Dan Newhouse announced Wednesday he will not seek reelection in 2026 after spending over a decade in the House.

item.title: House Republican who voted to impeach Trump in 2021 won't seek re-election
item.description: Rep. Dan Newhouse, R-Wash., will not seek re-election in 2026, he announced Wednesday, thanking both his constituents and colleagues.

item.title: The West’s Embrace Of Mass Third-World Migration Is Civilizational Suicide
item.description: The West's mass importation of Third-Worlders with no emphasis on assimilation has been, is, and will continue to be a complete failure.

item.title: State-Sanctioned Suicide Is The 4th Leading Cause Of Death In Canada
item.description: 'The doctors who advocate for it call it compassion, but ethical doctors are healers, not killers.'

item.title: The Arsenal of Democracy Can’t Be Backordered
item.description: We must push harder to build a capable American defense system for the 21st century.

item.description: “The health and safety of our customers is always a top priority,” Walmart said in a statement.
